title: FS: T206 Lot with commons and HOFs
author: Cozumeleno

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Lot with commons and HOFs
posts.post_content:
PRICE BUMP

I've acquired some T206 duplicates that I'd like to move. As you can see, these are lower-end cards. I won't describe each one individually, but please feel free to email if you need more description on any since my scanner isn't the greatest.

$2 shipping total no matter how many you buy - payments via PPFF.

GRADED
Fred Clarke Portrait/GAI 2 (Sweet Caporal 150/30) $55.00 - NOW $50.00
Johnny Evers Cubs on Shirt/SGC Authentic (Sweet Caporal 150/25) - $45.00 (small punch hole) - NOW 40.00
Hal Chase Dark Cap Throwing/SGC 10 (Piedmont 350/25) - $20.00 - NOW $18.00 

RAW
Addie Joss Pitching (Sweet Caporal 350/30) - $45.00 (pinholes)
Chief Bender Portrait (Sweet Caporal 350/25) - $40.00
Rube Marquard Portrait (Sweet Caporal) - (back mostly skinned) - SOLD
Joe Kelley (Piedmont 350/25) - SOLD
Joe McGinnity (Sweet Caporal 350) - SOLD
Al Burch Batting (Piedmont 150/25) - $15.00
Doc Adkins (Piedmont 350/25) - $15.00
Fred Tenney (Sweet Caporal 350/25) - $15.00 (tear/separation from left)
Gabby Street (Piedmont 350/25) - SOLD
Neal Ball Fielding (Piedmont) - SOLD
J.J. Clarke (Piedmont 150/25) - SOLD

Thanks for looking -

One-time price bump on about half of the remaining cards before moved to eBay tonight.

Thanks
